archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Business Contunity Quality Assurance Process
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation:
Similar as Security Architecture Review process - just for Business continuity.
Process has two levels, one which asks things high level and the more detailed one which is based on ISF Healthcheck
Possible questions for BCQA1:
- Do you have Business Continuity Plan? - Is the plan aligned with current Business Continuity Plan? - Is the plan aligned with current Business Continuity Rule? - Have you tested the Plan? - Is the plan Approved?
